articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A group of bicyclists for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula, which is led by Co-Vice Chairman Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The bicyclists laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers at the statues of the great leaders before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Foundation Day of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea took place in front of the Mausoleum of King Tangun on Monday.
					 Present at the event were Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party who doubles as chairman of the National Reconciliation Council, Kim Wan Su, director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who doubles as chairman of the North Side's Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Pak Myong Chol, member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, Choe Jin Su, presidium member of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who doubles as chairman of the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, officials of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang and overseas compatriots.
					
					 A memorial service for Tangun took place.
					
					 Then Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, made a report.
					
					 He said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il found out the ancestral father of the nation, who had been regarded as a mythical being, and demonstrated the good qualities of the Korean nation all over the world, adding their immortal exploits will be handed down through the age.
					
					 He praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for glorifying the DPRK as the world's advanced and highly civilized nation and a thriving power true to the will of the great leaders.
					
					 It is intolerable tragedy that our fellow compatriots are suffering pain and misfortune from national division by outside forces, he said, noting all Koreans should adhere to and thoroughly implement the immortal programme for reunification: the three principles of national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.    He called on all fellow compatriots to turn out in the efforts for accomplishing the national historic cause of building a reunified power, dignified and prosperous, on this land.

articles.title: Assistance to Flood Damage Rehabilitation in DPRK
articles.content:
Assistance to Flood Damage Rehabilitation in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A campaign for assisting the flood damage rehabilitation in the northern part of the DPRK is still going on throughout the country.
					 Fishery stations in Hanchon, Chongjin and other areas and the Pupho Offshore Farm under the Ministry of Fisheries recently offered a large amount of marine products and dried seaweeds to the disaster areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports sent many physical training apparatuses, measuring instruments, sportswear and other aid materials in scores of kinds to the flood-hit Yonsa County Juvenile Sports School in North Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Medical Service Brisk in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Medical Service Brisk in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Medical service is now getting brisk in the flood-hit northern part of the DPRK.
					 According to Kim Kyong Chol, department director of the Ministry of Public Health, hundreds of medical workers from health establishments in Pyongyang and North Hamgyong Province have been active in the disaster areas as field medical service team members.
					
					Tens of millions of medical supplies of over 400 kinds, including medicines and medical appliances, were urgently transported to the flood-hit areas and health checkup for 170,000 residents was conducted smoothly.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, October 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Nampho Port Monday on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, they looked round the photos dealing with the exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Present there were captain and crewmen of Chinese Taipei-flagged ship Zhang Hong 1.
					
					 The speakers said the WPK is an invincible and steel-strong party, which shines along with the august names of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, is leading the Korean people dynamically stepping up the building of a socialist power under the unfurled banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, they noted.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the Korean people would register bigger successes in their struggle for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on U.S. Rhetoric "Threat to World Community"
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on U.S. Rhetoric "Threat to World Community"
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The United States has frequently claimed that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea poses "threat to the world community".
					 In this regard, Dr. Kang Chol of Kim Il Sung University, an expert on journalism, told KCNA in reference to phrase "world community" the U.S. has repeatedly mentioned:
					
					 Doug Bandow, a former special assistant to U.S. President Ronald Reagan, said it was utterly absurd to describe the DPRK's nuclear test as a "direct threat to world community" and nobody on the earth shows interest in the fanciful being, "world community", the U.S. mentioned.
					
					 In a word, "world community" is a fiction often made by the U.S. to pull up the DPRK over its self-defensive measures.
					
					 A Brazilian newspaper contended that the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces would brand as "rogue states" and "threat to the world community" any countries standing against their gangster-like logic and openly encroach upon their sovereignty and rights to existence by abusing the name of the United Nations.
					
					 Then, where does the real threat come from in this world?
					
					 The answer can be found in an article titled "Who was the mastermind of nuclear test in the DPRK", carried by Chinese newspaper Ta Kung Pao in Hong Kong.
					
					 What compelled the DPRK to possess nuclear weapons was mainly the military arbitrariness, armed intervention and high-handed practices done by the U.S. in Iraq, Libya and other parts of the world, the article said, adding it is none other than the U.S. who threatens the whole world while escalating the tense situation.
					
					 Political and press circles in many countries have contended that the U.S. is entirely responsible not only for the DPRK's nuclear issue but also for all the crises in the various regions of the world.
					
					 The U.S., chief criminal threatening the international community and wrecking the global peace, should behave itself, pondering over its catastrophic crisis to be caused by its reckless action such as shifting the blame for its wrongdoings onto others.

articles.title: Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Koreans mark the 9th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration. 
					 The Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity brought fresh joy to all Koreans ardently aspiring after the country's reunification. It is a practical programme which proceeded from the absolute recognition and confirmation of the idea of By Our Nation Itself whose validity and vitality have been proved in practice in the June 15 era.
					
					 Regarding patriotism as his lifelong motto, leader Kim Jong Il provided two north-south summits for the first time in the history of the division of the Korean nation and made sure that agreements common to the nation were adopted, laying an eternal cornerstone for national reunification.
					
					 Events startling the world took place one after another thanks to the broad magnanimity and generosity of Kim Jong Il who led whoever was desirous of national reconciliation, unity and reunification to take the road of reunification and patriotism.
					
					 Dialogue and contacts at different levels were brisk between the north and the south and preparations for implementing the agreements raid progress in various fields.
					
					 Precious fruits common to the nation were yielded to wipe out mutual misunderstanding and mistrust and please all Koreans and all Koreans at home and abroad were full of great hope and confidence in the country's reunification.
					
					 The desire for reunification growing strong in the country that had remained  frozen for  more than half a century due to distrust and confrontation faced a serious challenge owing to the anti-reunification moves of the group of traitors backed by outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group of traitors which took power under the manipulation of the U.S. totally denied the north-south joint declarations with the heinous "May 24 step" while grumbling about the "lost decade" and made desperate efforts to implement the declarations.
					
					 They branded the agreements common to the nation as the "pro-communist documents profiting the enemy" and opened to public even the records of the north-south summit, totally shutting down the KIZ overnight which was the last hope of the north-south relations. 
					
					 They are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to the Korean nation while malignantly slandering the DPRK's sincere proposal for holding a joint conference to pave a wide avenue to peace and independent reunification of the country through the concerted efforts of the Koreans as "a camouflaged peace offensive" and asserting " north's dismantlement of its nukes is a top priority task."
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that as long as the puppet conservative group persist in their inveterate dependence on outside forces and moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots in the north, while seeking to realize the daydream of "unification under liberal democracy" and "unification by absorption," neither reconciliation nor unity can be achieved between the north and the south.
					
					 The national reunification means most ardent patriotism and cherished desire of the Korean nation who has boasted time-honored history and brilliant culture spanning 5,000 years. 
					
					 The Korean nation is no longer a weak nation in the past which suffered national ruin and division after being deprived of sovereignty by outside forces. 
					
					 The Korean nation has grown to be a resourceful and powerful nation capable of independently carving out its destiny and future including the issue of Korea's reunification.
					
					 No matter how desperately the separatist forces at home and abroad may maneuver, the cause of the country's reunification is sure to be successfully accomplished as it has advanced along the orbit of national independence. 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration, reunification programme common to the nation, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, will always remain viable.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for National Reunification Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for National Reunification Lauded
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, was interviewed by KCNA on Oct. 3 on the 9th anniversary of the October 4 declaration. He said:
					 In October 2007 leader Kim Jong Il provided another historic summit to bring about a new higher phase in developing the inter-Korean ties and signed a declaration for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace and prosperity.
					
					 The declaration based on the three principals of national reunification, the keynote of which is the idea of By Our Nation Itself, is an action programme for comprehensively implementing the June 15 joint declaration and thus achieving peace of the country and prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 The adoption of the declaration helped give momentum to the enthusiasm of all fellow countrymen to achieve independent reunification and usher in a heyday of national reconciliation and unity unprecedented in the history of national reunification.
					
					 It was the distinguished feats performed by Kim Jong Il before the times and the nation that he opened a bright prospect of achieving national independence and the cause of great national unity and provided the fellow countrymen with a banner for attaining national reunification.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is now steering the movement for reunification.
					
					 The new morning of national reunification, the cherished desire of the compatriots, is sure to break as they are led by Kim Jong Un, the lodestar of national reunification. 
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the Anti-Imperialists National Democratic Front and patriotic people in the south will decisively foil the anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and energetically bring about a turning phase of national reunification.

articles.title: Traitor Park Geun Hye's Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
Traitor Park Geun Hye's Remarks Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea spouted invectives against the DPRK at a "ceremony marking the day of ROK army" on Saturday inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. She branded the DPRK's just measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence as "provocations" and "reckless acts" threatening peace of the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world. Not content with blustering that the north will "meet self-destruction" unless it gives up the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, she told the lie that "the north declared the use of nukes against the south Korean people." She, at the same time, unhesitatingly agitated "defection from the north," impudently trumpeting about "politics of terror" and "human rights abuses" and daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. She reeled off such string of ridiculous jargons as crying out for "getting united" an
					 d "defen
					
					 ding south Korea," justifying the reckless moves for THAAD deployment, a product of despicable policy of submitting to the U.S., with such sheer sophism as "the minimum defensive measure."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 To put together all the malignant invectives Park has spouted against the DPRK in her public appearances, they indicate that her confrontation hysteria has gone beyond the tolerance limit and she is now making her last-ditch efforts with a dagger between her teeth.
					
					 It is a matter of time that she is bound to perish in the face of the mindset of the angry people just as her father did while arrogantly using unlimited power through "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group would be well advised to clearly know they can never escape the mounting resistance against Chongwadae no matter how desperately they may work to block the just struggle of the south Korean people. 
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, treasured sword of justice and peace and weapon for the prosperity of the nation, is not targeting the compatriots in the south who will live together with their brothers and sisters in the north for all ages on this land.
					
					 The DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear force of justice in every way to mete out a merciless punishment to the foreign forces persistently resorting to aggression, plunder, domination and interference, independently pave the way for reunification and prosperity and punish such group of traitors as Park who kowtows to the U.S. 
					
					 If Park stops reckless tongue-lashing only when she faces precision nuclear strike at Chongwadae, it will be as foolish and ridiculous an act as meeting self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Country's Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Country's Nuclear Force 
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- It is the firm faith and iron will of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country and valuable peace and usher in a new era of national prosperity by dint of self-defensive capabilities with the nuclear force as a pivot, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary, and goes on:
					 The DPRK has built up its muscle to protect its destiny from the decades-long sanctions and blockade. It will never dismantle its nuclear weapons and make a switchover in the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, scared by the invectives of the enemies and tightened sanctions.
					
					 It is the tragedy of the 21st century and shame on our planet that the U.S., the only nuclear war criminal and the empire of evil, forces the DPRK to dismantle nukes though the former inflicted a nuclear disaster upon humankind and brought misfortune and pain to innocent people through nuclear blackmail.
					
					 The DPRK did not have access to nukes to do harm to humankind unlike the U.S. Nor it possessed nukes to rank itself among a few big powers holding sway over the world political trend.
					
					 It took the action to have access to nukes in order to defend the sovereignty of the country and protect the vital rights of the people from the ever-increasing U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and blockade.
					
					 It is the choice of the people to go nuclear.
					
					 The prosperity achieved at the cost of humiliation and the peace gained while allowing sovereignty to be violated are not what our people desire.
					
					 They considered nukes of Juche as their vital right in order to prevent the nuclear disaster imposed by the enemy and achieve the everlasting national prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes guarantee national prosperity.
					
					The DPRK will enjoy higher dignity and have stronger might when it further bolsters up its treasured nuclear sword.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons, a product of the great line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, will mercilessly strike the nuclear stick being recklessly wielded by the robber-like U.S. imperialists so that injustice may not ride roughshod any longer.
					
					 The world will witness how Juche Korea possessed of the most just and powerful nukes for the people will prevail over all sorts of injustice and foil high-handed and arbitrary practices on our planet to bring bright future of everlasting prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Stop to Attempt at Autopsy of Paek Nam Gi's Body Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to Attempt at Autopsy of Paek Nam Gi's Body Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a statement on September 29 accused the Seoul Central District Court of issuing a warrant for autopsy of Paek Nam Gi's body.
					 It is too harsh and going beyond common sense to insist that autopsy should be conducted through consultation between the bereaved family, the victim, and police, the assailant, the statement noted, adding: Autopsy of Paek Nam Gi is not necessary as the cause of his death is very clear.
					
					 The international community is unanimously criticizing the attempt at autopsy going against the will of the bereaved family.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" to observe the minimum decorum for the victim and bereaved family and immediately stop the attempt at autopsy.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Vow to Join in General Strike of Workers
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Vow to Join in General Strike of Workers
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- South Korean youth and students held a press conference outside the puppet government building in Seoul on September 28 in support of the general strike of workers against evil labor policy of the authorities, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 They disclosed the hypocritical nature of the authorities' claim that the introduction of the system of paying wages according to piece rate would help increase jobs for young people. 
					
					 Noting that the regime knows well that its deceptive policy and measures can not ensure stable jobs desired by the youth, they declared that they would join workers in their strike.

articles.title: Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Can Never Be Falsified
articles.content:
Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Can Never Be Falsified
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on September 30 protested against forcible dissolution of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster.
					 The editorial branded the "government" and the "Saenuri Party" as criminal forces hindering the work to probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 It said that a fresh action would be launched to find the truth of the ferry Sewol disaster by the efforts of the bereaved families and other people, stressing that probe into truth behind the disaster is the solemn commitment Park Geun Hye and the ruling and opposition parties made before the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Autopsy of Paek Nam Gi's Body
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Autopsy of Paek Nam Gi's Body
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A member of the emergency measures committee of the Kukmin Party of south Korea at the "National Assembly" on September 30 requested the authorities and the UN secretary general to accept the assertion of a UN special rapporteur opposing the autopsy of peasant Paek Nam Gi's body by police.
					 The special rapporteur on September 28 denounced the prosecution and police of south Korea for attempting to conduct autopsy of Paek's body and urged the authorities to respect the intention of the bereaved family opposing the autopsy. 
					
					 He said the authorities should hold the assailant responsible for the death and make proper compensation to the bereaved family. 
					
					 He hoped that Ban Ki-moon would take a responsible stand as UN secretary general. 
					
					 He demanded the prosecution and police halt the act of killing the peasant twice by making autopsy of his body all of a sudden.

articles.title: South Korean People Hold Rally to Mourn Paek Nam Gi
articles.content:
South Korean People Hold Rally to Mourn Paek Nam Gi
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A rally was held in Seoul on Oct. 1 to denounce the man-killing regime and mourn peasant Paek Nam Gi, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 More than thirty thousand people including workers and peasants gathered before the hospital of Seoul National University.
					
					 They showed their anger at the attempt of the police and prosecution to make an autopsy of the late Paek.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions advanced a proposal of people's action to the effect that they would expand incense-burning altars in 114 areas across south Korea, conduct a signature campaign for special investigation for probing the truth behind the violence to Paek and punishing those responsible for the case and hold rallies to mourn the late Paek throughout south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean People Launch Struggle against U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean People Launch Struggle against U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "No-THAAD! Conclude Peace Treaty! Anti-U.S.! Preparatory Committee for Citizens and Students Grand March" launched an action for peace against the U.S. in Ryongsan of Seoul on September 24, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The participants condemned the U.S. as a bad country threatening peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They launched a demonstration march chanting anti-U.S. slogans.
					
					 They held a rally before the U.S. military base in Ryongsan and denounced the environment pollution by the U.S. forces.
					
					 Earlier, there took place an anti-U.S. rally around the Kwanghwamun in Seoul.

articles.title: Actions against Park Geun Hye Group Called for
articles.content:
Actions against Park Geun Hye Group Called for
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally in Taegu on October 1 on the lapse of seven decades since the October popular resistance and called for the actions to settle accounts with the Park Geun Hye group, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The speakers said the October popular resistance has been recorded in history even now as righteous struggle for abolishing the group of traitors violating life of the people.
					
					 The KCTU should take the lead in the struggle for changing the world as the workers did in the October popular resistance, they said, adding that the wind of the struggle will sweep across south Korea with the rally as an occasion.
					
					 They called upon workers to turn out in the struggle to put an end to the Park Geun Hye regime and build a new world where the workers become master in the spirit of the October popular resistance. 
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants launched a demonstration march.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Denounce Park Geun Hye's Regime of South Korea
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Denounce Park Geun Hye's Regime of South Korea
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held rallies before the south Korean consulates general in New York and Los Angeles at the same time on Sept. 30.
					 They mourned for the death of the south Korean peasant Paek Nam Gi and waged an action to denounce the Park Geun Hye's regime of south Korea.
					
					 They gave vent to their anger, saying that an autopsy on the late Paek can not be allowed.
					
					 They noted they would continue their struggle in solidarity to make the Park Geun Hye's regime apologize, make a special investigation and stop the attempt at autopsy.
					
					 They conducted agitation activities to make known the truth behind the death of Paek and the violence by the fascist police.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Un Introduced in Hungary
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Un Introduced in Hungary
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Hungarian Workers' Party carried President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Further Strengthen the People's Government" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" in the newspaper Szabadsag and a website on September 26.
					 The work of Kim Il Sung published on December 15, Juche 66 (1977) clarifies the principled issues for strengthening the people's government, powerful weapon in the revolution and construction, and for increasing its function and role in every way.
					
					 The work of Kim Jong Un published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary life-long exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The work gives the tasks for firmly defending and glorifying the ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Marked in Cambodia, Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Marked in Cambodia, Germany
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Cambodia and Germany on Sept. 28 to mark the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Present at the seminars were figures of various circles and masses in those countries.
					
					 The editor-in-chief of the Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union, historic root of the WPK, in his teens.
					
					 He led the bloody anti-Japanese war to victory and thus accomplished the historic cause of national liberation and founded the WPK.
					
					 He strengthened the WPK into the party of serving the people both in name and reality.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il consolidated the unity and cohesion of the party guided by the Juche idea in every way and built it as the party strong in organizing ability and fighting capability.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is of great significance for the WPK.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people will certainly win victory in their struggle for building a socialist power and reunifying the country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany lauded the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men, saying that the world progressives are keenly grasping the truth and validity of the cause of socialism through the reality of the DPRK.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Chinese Magazine
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Chinese Magazine
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The September issue of the Chinese Hong Kong magazine International Link carried a special write-up illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un to observe the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The magazine in an article said:
					
					 The WPK is called the great party of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the founder of the WPK.
					
					 He is the prominent leader who built the WPK into a guiding force of the Korean society and a prestigious party steering the cause of human independence.
					
					 The cause of the President was carried forward by HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					HE Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the WPK who developed the party into the party of Comrade Kim Il Sung and a powerful political organization steering the Songun revolution.
					
					 It is the unanimous will and unshakable faith of all members of the WPK to glorify the party as the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist one forever under the wise leadership of Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Another article titled "Mysterious leader" said:
					
					 Modes of activities employed by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in the confrontation with the U.S., are just like an equation the solution of which is hard to find.
					
					 That's why U.S. strategists on Korea are finding themselves in dilemma.
					
					Praising the greatness of Kim Jong Un, the article said the strategists of the U.S. could not but acknowledge their incompetence before his all-round political knowledge and thinking faculty, strong pluck and superb strategy as a brilliant commander.
					
					 The article was illustrated with photos of the military parade, public procession of the Pyongyang citizens and torchlight procession of young vanguard marking the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Persons Praised by Personages of Mexico, Nigeria
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Persons Praised by Personages of Mexico, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show were held by the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, a lecture by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and a film show by the Akit-Rungna Koryo Center in Nigeria between Sept. 23 and 28 on the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st anniversary of the founding of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the leadership feats President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed in party building.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and photos and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Korean films "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and "Monument to Party Founding" were shown.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said in a speech that Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, founded the WPK and strengthened it into the ever-victorious militant ranks.
					
					 As led by him, the Korean people could become the genuine master of the country, the general secretary noted.
					
					 He pointed out that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the DPRK is registering eye-opening achievements in the drive to bolster nuclear deterrence to cope with the nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Il Sung set forth the Juche-based idea and theory of building the party and consolidated the WPK into the steel-like party and the revolutionary party serving the people, deeply rooted among them.
					
					 He noted that under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un the DPRK is giving fuller play to its might as a nuclear power and space power.
					
					 Doctors of the Akit-Rungna Koryo Center in Nigeria praised the great leaders for founding and strengthening the WPK.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Celebrated by Bulgarian Body
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Celebrated by Bulgarian Body
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association published the October issue of its bulletin.
					 In an article titled "71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" the bulletin said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung put forward the Juche-based idea and theory of building the party and provided the organizational and ideological foundation for building the party during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. Right after the liberation of Korea he founded the party and realized the cause of building the army and the state.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has strengthened into a mass party deeply rooted among the broad segments of popular masses, and under the leadership of the Party the Korean people won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, finished the rehabilitation and construction in a short span of time after the war and have stepped up socialist construction.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by Comrade Kim Il Sung deeply instilled into progressive mankind the truth that only when they struggle against aggression and submission, can they defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and win victory in the revolution and that the nation with pride and self-esteem is sure to win.
					
					 That is why the ranks of the Juche idea followers are increasing day by day in many countries of the world.
					
					 The Korean people have firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and worked miracles and innovations in socialist construction despite the U.S. persistent military threat and economic blockade for several decades.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, in particular, the DPRK has made eye-opening development in building a socialist power and ranked itself among the nuclear powers.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Marked in Egypt, Austria
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Marked in Egypt, Austria
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Egypt and a lecture in Austria on Sept. 27 and 28 on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt said that the WPK and the Korean people have always achieved victory and glory under the guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 As led by HE Kim Jong Un, the WPK is giving fuller play to its might as an invincible party and the DPRK is registering eye-opening successes in all fields, resolutely shattering the heinous moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle it, they stressed.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche idea in Vienna said:
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung is the eternal leader of the Korean people who liberated the country from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and founded the WPK.
					
					 The Korean people, holding HE Kim Jong Un in high esteem as chairman of the WPK, is winning great victory in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country, build a socialist power and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The participants in the events watched Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "Monument to Party Founding".

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre Puerto de Hungnam
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Puerto de Hungnam
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju recorrio el Puerto de Hungnam.
					En varios puntos, hizo conocimiento detallado de la salida de cargueros y la carga de cemento y estimulo a los obreros y los habitantes de la ciudad de Hamhung movilizados para enviar urgentemente mucho mas cemento a los campos de recuperacion de danos en las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					En la reunion consultiva efectuada en el terreno, se discutieron los asuntos para poner en pleno funcionamiento las gruas portuarias mediante el buen mantenimiento tecnico de equipos y aumentar el volumen de transporte maritimo de materiales necesarios a la campana de recuperacion al priorizar el transporte ferroviario hasta el puerto.
					
					Por otra parte, Pak Pong Ju recorrio el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, el Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong y la Fabrica de Electrodos de Hungnam donde tomo las medidas de trabajo para normalizar la produccion, proveer a tiempo de suficientes materiales para la reparacion de equipos y mejorar la calidad de productos.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por Dia de la Fundacion de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por Dia de la Fundacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 ante el Mausoleo de Tangun (fundador de Corea) el acto por el Dia de la Fundacion de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y director del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional, Kim Wan Su, director del Secretariado del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) y presidente del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, Pak Myong Chol, miembro de la presidencia del CC del FDRP, Choe Jin Su, miembro de la Presidencia del Comite Central del FDRP y presidente de la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria, los funcionarios del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun y otras entidades interesadas, los trabajadores capitalinos y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					Ante todo, tuvo lugar la ceremonia en recordacion de Tangun.
					
					El vicepresidente del Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun, Yun Jong Ho, presento informe de la ocasion.
					
					Dijo que seran transmitidas de generacion en generacion las proezas imborrables del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes buscaron al fundador de la nacion coreana, que hasta entonces se conocia como figura mitologica, y demostraron a todo el mundo la superioridad de la nacion coreana.
					
					Elogio las nobles personalidades del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien en acato al proposito de los grandes Lideres antecesores, convierte a la RPDC en el avanzado pais civilizado de talla mundial y potencia prospera.
					
					Es una tragedia insoportable que los coreanos sufrieran  mucho todavia debido a la division territorial impuesta por las fuerzas extranjeras, lamento y continuo que todos los coreanos deben defender y ejecutar cabalmente los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, eternos programas de reunificacion.
					
					Llamo a todos a sumarse a la historica causa pannacional por levantar en el territorio patrio una digna y prospera potencia reunificada.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intencion astuta de traidora Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intencion astuta de traidora Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la "ceremonia por el Dia de las Fuerzas Armadas" del dia primero, la traidora Park Geun-hye solto disparates que fomentan la confrontacion fratricida.
					 Califico de "provocacion" e "imprudencia" que amenazan la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo las justas medidas del fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear tomadas por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					  Chismeo que si la RPDC no abandona la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, "marchara por el camino de autodestruccion" y mintio que el "Norte (de Corea) declaro el uso de armas nucleares contra el pueblo surcoreano".
					
					  Y agito la "fuga del Norte" insultando sin vacilacion alguna hasta la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC con palabras como "la politica de terror" y la "violacion de derechos humanos".
					
					  Ademas, abogo por el emplazamiento de THAAD, producto de su sucia politica de sumision a EE.UU., justificandolo descaradamente como la "menor medida defensiva posible" e insistio en la necesidad de "unirse" y "defender el Sur de Corea".
					
					  Todos estos disparates anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye, dichos en el lugar publico, demuestran que ya paso el limite la fiebre conflictiva de esta traidora.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					  Como su padre que sufrio una muerte tragica mientras actuaba arrogantemente abusando del poder ilimitado mediante la dictadura de Yusin (renovacion), Park Geun-hye tambien sera condenada al fin vergonzoso por la indignada opinion publica. Esto es una cuestion del tiempo.
					
					  La banda de Park Geun-hye debe conocer bien que nunca podra evitar la furiosa resistencia contra Chongwadae por muy desesperados que fueran sus esfuerzos por impedir la lucha justa de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					  Nuestro disuasivo nuclear, remedio para la justicia y paz y herramienta de prosperidad nacional, no apunta a los coterraneos que viviran juntos compartiendo para siempre el mismo destino.
					
					  Centuplicamos las justas fuerzas nucleares para dar el golpe duro a las fuerzas foraneas, que siguen extendiendo las garras de agresion y saqueo, dominacion e intervencion en la nacion coreana, abrir independientemente el camino de la reunificacion y la prosperidad y castigar a los compinches como Park Geun-hye que traicionan a la nacion considerando a EE.UU. como su abuelo.
					
					  Park debe dejar de acusar las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC, antes de que se produzca el preciso e implacable ataque nuclear contra Chongwadae.

articles.title: Periodicos critican a Park Geun-hye por suplicar cooperacion en campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Periodicos critican a Park Geun-hye por suplicar cooperacion en campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales de Corea publicaron la vispera los comentarios individuales burlandose de la horda de Park Geun-hye que solicita obstinadamente la sancion y presion anti-RPDC en la ONU y otros escenarios internacionales.
					Esos imbeciles no saben como se ha cambiado la corriente de la historia debido a la posesion de armas nucleares por la RPDC, critica el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					No pudo conseguir nada la camarilla de Park Geun-hye aunque abogo tanto por endurecer la "sancion contra el Norte (de Corea)" y suplico la cooperacion extranjera en su campana nuclear contra esta parte connacional.
					
					Llego el momento de que ellos reconozcan y se adapten a la cambiada posicion estrategica de la RPDC.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que los titeres surcoreanos censuren de una manera u otra las fuerzas armadas autodefensivas de la RPDC.
					
					Ellos no podran debilitar nunca la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y seran condenados al fin tragico.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson senala que causa mas risa burlona que indignacion el comportamiento de la bruja de Chongwadae que reclama tanto la cooperacion extranjera en su campana para sancionar y atropellar a la RPDC divulgando el ya aburrido rumor de "provocacion" y "amenaza".
